metadata.Title: CVE-2023-46862 on Ubuntu 23.04 (lunar) - medium.
metadata.Description: An issue was discovered in the Linux kernel through 6.5.9. During a race with SQ thread exit, an io_uring/fdinfo.c io_uring_show_fdinfo NULL pointer dereference can occur.

criterions.comment: linux package in lunar is affected and needs fixing.
linux-allwinner: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of life').
linux-aws package in lunar is affected and needs fixing.
linux-azure package in lunar is affected and needs fixing.
